definition: Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October
cold/poor/to tremble
to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
surname Lu

sentences.english: His whole frame suffused with a cold dew .
People of the Dong ethnic group in Hunan province have the custom of making kippers during Cold Dew.
sentences.chinese: 在寒露时节制腌鱼是湖南侗家人的习俗。

sentences.english: That of a baby, weeping, whimpering, frosty dews align down on his cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿般的，嘤嘤地，两行寒露在脸颊上流淌。

sentences.english: People are not allowed to go to the mountains to pick the seeds until Cold Dew comes around.
sentences.chinese: 只有到了寒露季节，人们才能去山上采摘山茶花籽。

sentences.english: Perennial Cold Dews , the rainfall in southern China has increasingly reduced.
sentences.chinese: 常年寒露期间，华南雨量亦日趋减少。

definition: Shuangjiang or Frost Descends, 18th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd October-6th November
Lidong or Start of Winter, 19th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st November
Qiufen or Autumn Equinox, 16th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd September-7th October
Chushu or End of Heat, 14th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd August-7th September
Liqiu or Start of Autumn, 13th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd August
Bailu or White Dew, 15th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd September
the cool of autumn
Jingzhe or Insects Wake, 3rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-20th March
Lesser Cold, 23rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-19th January
Dashu or Great Heat, 12th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd July-6th August
frost and dew/fig. difficult conditions
Xiaoshu or Lesser Heat, 11th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd July
autumn frost/fig. white hair as sign of old age
late autumn
Mangzhong or Grain in Beard, 9th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-20th June
autumn rain
